ygData.subject: Re: Bones, bones bones...
ygData.msgSnippet: All necromancer pet spells use two bone chips from level 1-49. Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 50th Level ... From: Christopher King
ygData.messageBody:
All necromancer pet spells use two bone chips from level 1-49.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 50th Level
-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher King <CKing@...>
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, December 03, 1999 1:47 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Bones, bones bones...


ok.. call me silly:

Up till now (lev 16 jsut last night) I have been bonecollecting by huniting.
I like the self sufficient feeling it gives me!
But if I read correctly the 16th lev pet uses 5 bones per cast! that will be hard to harvest. So time to buy. It never occurred to me before, but ARE there vendors who sell bone chips in quantity? At the guild maybe? I have only seen single chips on vendors out in the fields and such...

thx :)
<blushes>
Stricken
Gnome, Vallon Zek
